name: AI WebAdmin (Cloudflare Worker)
description: Connects WordPress to AI WebAdmin workers for comment moderation, security workflows, Cloudflare onboarding, and audit automation.
changelog:
0.2.25

  • Added per-image AI action in Media Library: AI Optimize + Offload to R2.
  • Added bulk Media Library action and full-library run button to process all images.
  • Added Worker endpoint /plugin/wp/media/enrich for OpenAI-generated title/alt/caption/description/filename metadata from image content.
  • Media offload pipeline now calls AI enrichment before rename/optimization and stores metadata source.
  • Improved vault decryption to support CREDENTIAL_VAULT_KEY, GITHUB_VAULT_KEY, or shared-secret fallback.
